name: Curse of Satella
description:
Instructions:
-Every 10s you lose a heart due to the curse(The purple heart indicates the time of corruption).
-The golden heart is a pause from corrosion, to buy, etc.
-Defeat 3 waves to open the door and face the goddess.
Controlls:
-WASD -> move
-Left click -> attack
-[F] -> interact
-[ESC] -> skip intro
